title: Logos Round 2! [Deadline: Feb 2]
author: ebullient
content: Focus on shape and theme/concept, not color. We're trying to narrow it down from 4 concepts to 2 (even better would be 1). [Additional positioning and sizes](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1E4DqWuQGkborPXXWfwGJgVgf2N--V94HacFsptEbKFA) We'll narrow the poll question: 1. Choose your favorite concept (row: A, B, C, D). 2. (üöÄ, optional) Specific number if you have a favorite 3. (üëé, optional) Specific number if it is an absolute no Constructive comments help. We can further explore a concept once we narrow to a favorite (and if we haven't otherwise picked a winner).
